text: Ate jinham lokam ne siraka (alaha de sarika) kita, uha kahide hana ki jekara alaha cahuda tam asi usa tom binham na kise di badagi karade na sade vadere ate na asim usa tom sil'ham kise ciza nu naja'iza manade. Ajiha hi unham tom pahilam vali'am ne kita si. Basa rasulam di zinevari tam kevala sapha taura te upadesa pahuca dena hai
